name: SidePill
description:
Who is going to secure all the medkits? Play with your friends and see who is an epic gamer.

Project story: I created this project with online multiplayer in the base, but it ended up abandoned. When I was browsing the unity launcher (not unity hub), I've seen it and for a second I wanted to finish it with local multiplayer (just like the old games), and my brother said that it's a very good idea.
